content:
The forces of Ukraine's defense for the last week have destroyed almost nine battalions of personnel of the invaders.

Data on Russian losses from 25 to 31 MarchPublishedMilitary Media Center.

During the week, Ukrainian defenders eliminated 4720 enemies (conditionally 9 battalions).

In addition, 93 tanks (conventionally 3 tank battalions), 114 combat armored vehicles (conditionally 3 motor -raimen battalions) were destroyed.

178 artillery installations (conditionally 10 artillery divisions) and 43 rockets were also affected.

As reported by the Armyinform, for the last day of the Russian Federation troopsLost730 people, 20 tanks and 17 BBM.
title: Defense forces per week eliminated 4720 invaders and destroyed more than 200 units of armored vehicles
description: Data on Russian losses from March 25 to March 31 published Military Media Center. ...
author: Army Inform
